verses.verse: (A Prayer of David.) Incline <S%H5186><s%> Thine ear, <S%H241><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [and] answer <S%H6030><s%> me; For I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%>

Do preserve <S%H8104><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> for I am a godly <S%H2623><s%> man; <S%H2623><s%> O Thou my God, <S%H430><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> who trusts <S%H982><s%> in Thee.
Be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> For to Thee I cry <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long.
Make <S%H8055><s%> glad <S%H8055><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> For to Thee, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> I lift <S%H5375><s%> up my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

For Thou, Lord, <S%H136><s%> art good, <S%H2896><s%> and ready <S%H5546><s%> to forgive, <S%H5546><s%> And abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> who call <S%H7121><s%> upon Thee.
Give <S%H238><s%> ear, <S%H238><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> to my prayer; <S%H8605><s%> And give <S%H7181><s%> heed <S%H7181><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications! <S%H8469><s%>
In the day <S%H3117><s%> of my trouble <S%H6869><s%> I shall call <S%H7121><s%> upon Thee, For Thou wilt answer <S%H6030><s%> me.

There <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> Thee among the gods, <S%H430><s%> O Lord; <S%H136><s%> Nor <S%H369><s%> are there <S%H369><s%> any works <S%H4639><s%> like Thine.

All <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou hast made <S%H6213><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee, O Lord; <S%H136><s%> And they shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
For Thou art great <S%H1419><s%> and doest <S%H6213><s%> wondrous <S%H6381><s%> deeds; <S%H6381><s%> Thou alone <S%H905><s%> art God. <S%H430><s%>

Teach <S%H3384><s%> me Thy way, <S%H1870><s%> O Lord; <S%H3068><s%> I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in Thy truth; <S%H571><s%> Unite <S%H3161><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>

I will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> my heart, <S%H3824><s%> And will glorify <S%H3513><s%> Thy name <S%H8034><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
For Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> me is great, <S%H1419><s%> And Thou hast delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the depths <S%H8482><s%> of Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>

O God, <S%H430><s%> arrogant <S%H2086><s%> men <S%H2086><s%> have risen <S%H6965><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> me, And a band <S%H5712><s%> of violent <S%H6184><s%> men <S%H6184><s%> have sought <S%H1245><s%> my life, <S%H5315><s%> And they have not set <S%H7760><s%> Thee before <S%H5048><s%> them.

But Thou, O Lord, <S%H136><s%> art a God <S%H410><s%> merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> Slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth. <S%H571><s%>

Turn <S%H6437><s%> to me, and be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to me; Oh grant <S%H5414><s%> Thy strength <S%H5797><s%> to Thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> And save <S%H3467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Thy handmaid. <S%H519><s%>

Show <S%H6213><s%> me a sign <S%H226><s%> for good, <S%H9186><s%> That those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me may see <S%H7200><s%> [it], and be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> hast helped <S%H5826><s%> me and comforted <S%H5162><s%> me.
